If death row policy has to be introduced, the period of time from sentencing to death must be kept at a minimum time limit.
As many as 1 in every 35 adult males is a potential paedophile. Estimated 750,000 men in Britain have an interest in having sex with children, with 250,000 sexually attracted to children under the age of 12. (National Crime Agency).
Research indicates up to 20% of a conservative estimate of 320,000 suspected UK paedophiles were women. Lucy Faithfull Foundation (LFF-2009).
attributes.background: If you are tired of the relentless, constant news of paedophilia crime and abuse/murder of our innocent children. Please sign this petition if you agree that all paedophiles should be sentenced to death if found guilty in court.
